MBR-0001: Elegant king-sized bed frame constructed from solid mahogany with a classic espresso finish. Features a high headboard with intricate carvings and plush beige velvet upholstery. Manufactured by Grand Oak Designs, dimensions: 76"W x 80"L x 48"H.
MBR-0002: Luxurious 12-inch memory foam mattress by DreamRest, tailored for king-sized beds. Covered in hypoallergenic, breathable white cotton fabric. Offers medium-firm support, optimizing comfort for back and side sleepers. Dimensions: 76"W x 80"L.
MBR-0003: Antique-style nightstand in Victorian white with distressed finish and vintage brass handles. Features two drawers with dovetail joints, made by Heritage Furniture. Dimensions: 28"W x 18"D x 24"H.
LVR-0011: Modern sectional sofa in U-shape configuration, upholstered in light grey microfiber, designed for spacious living rooms. Includes built-in USB ports and storage compartments. Manufactured by Urban Modern Interiors. Dimensions: 112"W x 84"D x 34"H.
LVR-0012: Contemporary coffee table crafted from tempered glass and rose gold metal frame, featuring a lower shatter-resistant glass shelf for additional storage. Produced by Luxe Furnishings. Dimensions: 50"W x 30"D x 18"H.
LVR-0013: Mid-century modern armchair upholstered in mustard yellow velvet with walnut wood legs. Features a curved backrest and deep seat cushion for enhanced comfort. Made by Retro Revival. Dimensions: 34"W x 32"D x 36"H.
OPT-0211: Rattan outdoor dining set including a round table and four chairs with waterproof navy blue cushions. Table features a tempered glass top and umbrella hole. Manufactured by PatioLiving Essentials. Table dimensions: 48"W x 48"D x 29"H, Chair dimensions: 24"W x 24"D x 35"H.
OPT-0212: Outdoor swing chair with stand, woven from UV-resistant grey synthetic wicker and featuring plush cushions in teal. Perfect for patio or garden settings. Manufactured by Skyline Outdoor. Dimensions: 38"W x 35"D x 78"H.
OPT-0213: Heavy-duty grill station by BBQ Masters, featuring stainless steel construction, four burners, integrated temperature gauges, and side shelves. Ideal for backyard barbecues. Dimensions: 60"W x 24"D x 48"H.
ENT-0311: Ultra HD 65-inch smart television from VisionTech, featuring 4K resolution, HDR10 support, and built-in voice control capabilities. Perfect for family entertainment and gaming.
ENT-0312: Floating TV stand in glossy black finish with LED lighting, designed to accommodate screens up to 75 inches. Includes multiple storage compartments for devices and media. Manufactured by Streamline Decor. Dimensions: 72"W x 16"D x 18"H.
ENT-0313: High-fidelity sound system by SonicBoom, featuring a 7.1 channel surround sound setup, wireless subwoofer, and Bluetooth streaming. Ideal for movies, music, and games.
KIT-0411: Professional-grade chef's kitchen island with built-in sink and dishwasher. Constructed from stainless steel with a black granite countertop. Features include ample storage and prep space. Produced by Culinary Concepts. Dimensions: 72"W x 36"D x 36"H.
KIT-0412: Retro-style refrigerator in mint green, featuring energy-efficient cooling, adjustable shelves, and built-in ice maker. Manufactured by CoolTech Appliances. Dimensions: 32"W x 28"D x 70"H.
KIT-0413: Set of 6 high-back dining chairs, upholstered in dark brown leather with matte black metal legs. Elegant and comfortable, suitable for both casual and formal dining areas. Produced by Fine Dine Furnishings. Dimensions: 18"W x 22"D x 42"H.
GBR-0511: Queen-sized platform bed in light oak finish with a minimalist design. Includes a comfortable foam mattress and two matching oak side tables. Manufactured by Simple Sleep Solutions. Bed dimensions: 60"W x 80"L, Table dimensions: 20"W x 18"D x 24"H.
GBR-0512: Wall-mounted writing desk in white with a folding feature for space saving. Includes storage compartments for office supplies. Produced by Compact Living Furnishings. Dimensions: 40"W x 20"D x 18"H when extended.
GBR-0513: Modern floor lamp with adjustable height, featuring a brushed steel finish and a white fabric shade. Provides soft ambient lighting, perfect for reading or relaxing. Manufactured by Luminous Decor. Height adjustable from 48" to 60".
BMT-0611: Basement home theater seating in black leather, includes three reclining seats with cup holders and storage compartments. Designed for ultimate comfort and convenience during movie nights. Manufactured by Luxe Seating. Dimensions per seat: 36"W x 40"D x 40"H.
BMT-0612: Arcade gaming machine featuring over 200 classic games in a full-size cabinet with original graphics and joystick controls. Perfect for a fun and nostalgic entertainment area. Manufactured by RetroArcade. Dimensions: 25"W x 34"D x 76"H.
BMT-0613: Customizable bar set with stools, crafted from rustic reclaimed wood and featuring a natural finish. Includes a built-in wine rack and storage shelves. Ideal for creating a cozy entertainment spot. Manufactured by Barnwood Creations. Bar dimensions: 60"W x 24"D x 42"H, Stool dimensions: 18"W x 14"D x 30"H.
